channel.title: Sick Rock Insane Bush Music Politics Politic on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Sick Rock Insane Bush Music Politics Politic on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: so.. my cold is incredibly strange
item.description: today I coked myself up on cold medicine and pain killers and made it to work on time.. did work fine.. maybe a little less conscious.. but for the most part fine. and as soon as I got home I crashed like a drunk driver. I guess that makes since. but now at 1 in the morning I am wired off my head and listening to classic rock. all I want to do is sleep.
